strapiPost.title: Pack Your Boxes With Generosity During Diamond Property Group's Donation Drive
strapiPost.content:
Diamond Property Group believes every move can be a catalyst for change and will take advantage of "National Moving Month" by hosting Donate to Elevate: Pack Generosity in Your Boxes! in support of Samaritan Community Center on Saturday, May 27, from 10a-12p.

  • Donation drive: Whether you're relocating, decluttering, or wrapping up some spring cleaning, your donations of new or gently used furniture, clothing, and household items can make a big difference in supporting the work of the Samaritan Community Center.
  • Giving back: B2 Moving Services will help load and transport donations, and all who participate can enter a raffle featuring huge prizes, like a free consult from The Organizer Chicks! Plus, everyone who donates will receive a complimentary treat at YumYos.

The donation drive will happen at Pinnacle Hills Promenade in the parking lot east of Malco Theatre. Learn more HERE.
